mapper.select: select * from schedule sch , screen scr ,theater t ,movie m where sch.m_id = m.m_id AND sch.t_id = t.t_id AND sch.scr_id = scr.scr_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE (M_ID, TITLE, GNR, DIRECTOR, RUNNINGTIME, RESTRICT, ONAIR ,POSTER ,IMG1, IMG2, IMG3, IMG4, IMG5,CONTENT) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(M_ID),0)+1 FROM MOVIE), #{title}, #{gnr}, #{director}, #{runningtime}, #{restrict}, #{onair} ,#{poster} ,#{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{img4}, #{img5} ,#{content})
